Use household objects as makeshift equipment: You can substitute regular gym equipment with household items such as a chair for tricep dips, a gallon of water for shoulder presses, and a for lunges.
Try outdoor activities: You can explore the great outdoors and engage in activities such as hiking, cycling, or swimming to stay active.
Do bodyweight exercises: You can perform bodyweight exercises such as push-ups, squats, and lunges to maintain your fitness level.
Join a fitness class: You can join a fitness class that focuses on bodyweight exercises or other forms of resistance training to stay active.

Incorporate physical activity into your daily routine: You can add physical activity to your daily routine by taking the stairs instead of the elevator, walking or jogging to work, or doing housework or yard work.
